nodes.text: Norval II was a planet in the Calaron sector abounding with organic life.
It was the planet to which Darth Sidious sent the Mandalorian Protectors on a mission to capture Senator Padmé Amidala during the Clone Wars.

Sidious betrayed the Mandalorians, who were ambushed by the Jedi and the Ailon Nova Guard. Only three Mandalorians survived: Tobbi Dala, Fenn Shysa, and Spar. This betrayal also resulted in the destruction of the vast majority of BL-series Battle Legionnaire droids.
During the war against the reborn Emperor in 10 ABY, Norval II provided starfighters for the armed force stationed at Pinnacle Base.
